articles.title: Vivo X90 Pro and Vivo X90 smartphones launched in India, here is everything - OTV News
articles.description: Vivo launches X90 Pro and X90 smartphones in India with 120Hz 3D AMOLED displays, 50MP triple cameras, up to 12GB RAM, and 120W fast charging.
articles.content:
Vivo has recently launched two smartphones in India - Vivo X90 Pro and Vivo X90 - on April 26.
These phones feature an octa-core 4nm MediaTek Dimensity 9200 SoC, impressive camera setups, high-quali… [+1979 chars]
